title: Maestro Errors!!!
body:
Log:
6/15/2016 14:56:03.453 [WARN] com.riotgames.platform.gameclient.module.services.maestro.MaestroServiceImpl GAME_TRACE_LOG [MaestroService] type=connectMaestro step=1
6/15/2016 14:56:03.621 [WARN] com.riotgames.platform.gameclient.module.services.maestro.MaestroServiceImpl GAME_TRACE_LOG [MaestroService] type=maestroConnected step=2
6/15/2016 14:57:18.540 [WARN] com.riotgames.platform.gameclient.module.services.maestro.MaestroServiceImpl 0002 Maestro.heartbeatCheck: No Maestro heartbeat was received.
6/15/2016 14:57:18.551 [WARN] com.riotgames.platform.gameclient.module.services.maestro.MaestroServiceImpl 0004 Maestro.heartbeatCheck: Maestro is being placed on probation since no heartbeat has been detected.
6/15/2016 14:57:43.582 [WARN] com.riotgames.platform.gameclient.module.services.maestro.MaestroServiceImpl 0002 Maestro.heartbeatCheck: No Maestro heartbeat was received.
6/15/2016 14:57:43.583 [FATAL] com.riotgames.platform.gameclient.module.services.maestro.MaestroServiceImpl 0003 Maestro.heartbeatCheck: Maestro was on probation and no heartbeat has been detected.  Application will shutdown.

My league exits after a few minutes, it varies. I've put LOL in my exceptions to firewall, im running it in admin, compatibility mode, ive restarted computer, restarted client, uninstalled, reinstalled, everything. so wtf is going on? i was playing fine until around 10:30 pm PST on 6/14/16, then i just kept getting this error.

replies.body:
Maestro errors almost always indicate some sort of connection issue.  Maestro is a service that essentially lets PvP.net (the client, champ select) know what you are doing and what you are selecting.  Think of it as a game of catch between your computer and our servers, and when the ball is dropped, that error pops up.  To resolve it, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  I know you've tried editing your firewalls already, but make sure to complete all of the other steps found there.

Hit me up if you are still experiencing any problems!
